name: Identifiers.org
description: The Identifiers.org registry contains registered namespace and provider prefixes with associated access URIs for a large number of high quality data collections. These prefixes are used in web resolution of compact identifiers of the form PREFIX:ACCESSION or PROVIDER/PREFIX:ACCESSION commonly used to specify bioinformatics and other data resources.

dataset.name: Collection
dataset.description: Collection catalog with each assigned a unique namespace.

dataset.name: Resource
dataset.description: Resources (physical locations) providing access to the data.

publication.name: Uniform Resolution of Compact Identifiers for Biomedical Data
Identifiers.org and MIRIAM Registry: community resources to provide persistent identification.
